required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiology of Roller Hockey Related Injuries.
clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiology of Roller Hockey Related Injuries.

brief_summary.textblock: Roller Hockey is a sport played on a 40*20 metres rink characterized by combined periods of high intensity and short breaks, there´s a lack of epidemiological studies in this field. In line with the well-established model of sports injury prevention research proffered by van Mechelen, the first stage in this process is establishing the extent of the problem i.e. injury incidence, severity and burden. Through an online survey filled by semiprofessional athletes, it is posible to obtain all this important information. This way, it will be possible to fulfill a gap in the literature and take action in the near future in order to reduce the prevalence of injuries in this sport.

detailed_description.textblock: A retrospective study was performed in male Roller Hockey players. 275 players will be recruited. Data of all injury along a whole season will be collected. Patients' information, including age, number of years playing, skill level and injured body part, will be analysed.

primary_outcome.description: Injury prevalence rates [Injury prevalence rates calculated per 1000 hours of play]

secondary_outcome.description: Days lost per 1000 hours of exposure
Number of injuries sustained during training/ Number of injuries sustained during a match (% of all)

secondary_outcome.measure: Injury prevalence by mechanism of injury
secondary_outcome.description: Number of injuries according to the mechanism of injury (Contact (Direct or indirect) or Non-Contact) (% of all)
Distribution of injuries according to location of the injury (on the body, % of all)

secondary_outcome.measure: Injury prevalence according to tissue affected
secondary_outcome.description: Description of the distribution of injuries according to the type of the injury (muscle only) (% of all)

study_pop.textblock: Roller Hockey players playing in the spanish senior´s third division league

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: Being a roller hockey player, play for one of the teams who participated in the 2020-2021 season third division league (Ok Liga Bronce). Play in at least one match in the season.
-
Exclusion Criteria: Being unable to understand the questionaire, do not accept on participating in the study.
-
